modul.name: SineLfo

vardef.name: phi
vardef.description: Initial phase of LFO (negativ to skip initialisation)

modul.opcode: /* Sine low frequency oscillator */ opcode SineLfo, k, kki kfrq, kamp, iphi xin kfrq limit kfrq, 0, 100 kamp limit kamp, 0, 50000 iphi limit iphi, -1, 1 kout oscil kamp, kfrq, gisinelfo, iphi xout kout endop
